subject: Productivity
title: The Prefrontal Cortex Battle
description: A quick win: understand The Prefrontal Cortex Battle.

hook.text: Your prefrontal cortex knows the report is due Friday. Your limbic system wants to scroll instead.

buildup.text: The prefrontal cortex handles planning and impulse control. The limbic system craves comfort now.

discovery.text: Brain scans show procrastinators have weaker connections between these two regions.

twist.text: The limbic system always fires first. By the time the prefrontal cortex reacts, the phone is already open.

climax.text: Strengthening that connection is possible. Regular practice of delayed gratification builds the pathway.

punchline.text: Procrastination is your impulse brain winning the race.

quiz.question: What did brain scans reveal about procrastinators?
options: Weaker connections between prefrontal cortex and limbic system
